Articles.Content:
Can anyone help please?

I have recently purchased KSP, installed and licenced it on my laptop and now my hard drive has died. I've installed a new drive and reinstalled KSP but now can't activate KSP as the server informs me I have no available licences?

I have emailed KSP support but no response as yet?

Any suggestions?

Thanks,

Rob.

Where did you buy KSP from Robert?

There is no licence activation or activation server for KSP...

Edit:

Guy goes offline without answering...

Moving to Kerbal Network.

Edited August 15, 2015 by sal_vager

Guy goes offline without answering...

Well, I'd not blame him, the KSP forum is incredibly quick to respond to problems, much faster than most of the other forums I've seen...
Possibly, he may try again in a few hours, so I left him a PM about the thread move and a few other things, he either bought KerbalEdu or got scammed.

Possibly, he may try again in a few hours, so I left him a PM about the thread move and a few other things, he either bought KerbalEdu or got scammed.

That's what I was scared of, a scam.

What I don't see is how he wouldn't be able to open KSP.exe (or .app on mac) directly.
